member.name: T:Tizen.System.SystemSettings
member.summary: The System Settings API provides APIs for sharing the configuration over a system.
member.remarks: The System Settings API provides functions for getting the system configuration related to user preferences. The main features of the System Settings API include accessing system-wide configurations, such as ringtones, wallpapers, and so on.

member.name: P:Tizen.System.SystemSettings.IncomingCallRingtone
member.summary: The file path of the current ringtone.
member.exception: Thrown when application does not have privilege to access this method.

member.name: P:Tizen.System.SystemSettings.LocaleCountry
member.summary: Indicates the current country setting in the <LANGUAGE>_<REGION> syntax. The country setting is in the ISO 639-2 format, and the region setting is in the ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.
member.exception: Thrown when application does not have privilege to access this method.

member.name: P:Tizen.System.SystemSettings.LocaleLanguage
member.summary: Indicates the current language setting in the <LANGUAGE>_<REGION> syntax. The language setting is in the ISO 639-2 format, and the region setting is in the ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.
member.exception: Thrown when application does not have privilege to access this method.

member.name: P:Tizen.System.SystemSettings.LocaleTimeFormat24HourEnabled
member.summary: Indicates whether the 24-hour clock is used. If the value is false, the 12-hour clock is used.
member.exception: Thrown when application does not have privilege to access this method.

member.name: P:Tizen.System.SystemSettings.LocaleTimeZone
member.summary: Indicates the current time zone, for example, Pacific/Tahiti.
member.exception: Thrown when application does not have privilege to access this method.

member.summary: GET (string) Indicates the current language setting in the <LANGUAGE>_<REGION> syntax. The language setting is in the ISO 639-2 format, and the region setting is in the ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

member.summary: GET (bool) Indicates whether the 24-hour clock is used. If the value is false, the 12-hour clock is used.

member.summary: GET (string) Indicates the current time zone, for example, Pacific/Tahiti.

member.summary: GET (int) Once system changes the time, this event occurs to notify the time change.

member.summary: GET (bool) Indicates whether the screen lock sound is enabled on the device, for example, the LCD on or off sound.

member.summary: GET (bool) Indicates whether the device user has the enabled motion feature.

member.summary: GET (bool) Indicates whether WiFi-related notifications are enabled on the device.

member.summary: GET (bool) Indicates whether the device is in the flight mode.

member.summary: GET (int) Indicates the current lock state.

member.summary: GET (string) Indicates the ADS ID for each device.

member.name: F:Tizen.System.SystemSettingsKeys.UltraDataSave

member.name: F:Tizen.System.SystemSettingsKeys.UltraDataSavePackageList
member.summary: GET (string) Indicates the Ultra Data Save Package List. Since 4.0, the list is a string containing whitelisted package names separated with semicolons (;).
